Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Have a quick chat with @tart-1 about some art implementation issues.
Conduct thorough testing of the main menu, HUD, settings panel, tutorial system, and error message system. Document any bugs or issues found.
Address the bugs and issues identified during testing. Work with @qtest-1 to verify the fixes.
Refactor and optimize the UI code for performance. Ensure the UI is responsive and does not impact game performance.
Check some news on social media.
Lunch break. Enjoy the Friday lunch with the team.
Prepare a summary of the work completed this week, including accomplishments and challenges faced.
Document the UI architecture and key implementation details. Create diagrams and flowcharts to illustrate the system design.
Share the week's progress and documentation with the team. Answer any questions and provide support.
Plan for next week's tasks. Prioritize the remaining UI elements and player feedback systems to be implemented.
Log out from the OA system. Happy Friday!
